name: Crux - Passport - Corona Gorda
additionalNotes: Crux Passport. Because even though you may not be able to travel the world, you can enjoy a Crux Passport anytime. Which will give you the same relaxation, at a fraction of the cost. Made from carefully selected tobaccos, the wrapper is classified for color, oil content, texture and combustion to produce a something special. When you get yours, keep an eye out for the interesting floral note on the retrohale.
